A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't get it. Why are people championing this movie? It falls short in every way. They've sprinkled marvel dust into the sacred formula. Have you seen the hobbit trilogy? Have you seen the 8 Pirates of the Caribbean films? this is just like that\, full of cheesy one liners\, forgettable characters and plot holes. I was very satisfied with The Force Awakens and I was so excied to see more but Disney Disneyfied the whole thing.
